Products.sectionDescription: Explore our diverse range of High Pressure Laminates, designed to provide unique solutions for durability, aesthetics, and functionality.

hpl.title: HPL Sheets
hpl.subtitle: Standard Collection
hpl.description: Experience the perfect blend of durability and design. Our HPL sheets offer exceptional resistance to heat and scratches, available in over 500 stunning designs to elevate any commercial or residential interior.

compact.title: Compact Laminate
compact.subtitle: Heavy Duty Solutions
compact.description: Engineered for the most demanding environments. These self-supporting solid core panels withstand moisture, impact, and high traffic, making them the ideal choice for partitions, lockers, and wall cladding.

doubleface.title: Double Face HPL (Fiber Board)
doubleface.subtitle: Furniture Grade
doubleface.description: A structural ready-to-use solution featuring high-pressure laminate on both sides with a premium fiber core. Perfect for cabinetry, furniture manufacturing, and interior architectural elements.

postforming.title: Postforming
postforming.subtitle: Curved Excellence
postforming.description: Break free from straight lines. Our postforming laminates are designed to bend around curved edges, creating seamless, modern surfaces for countertops, desks, and architectural features.

NewArrivals.sectionDescription: Explore our newest additions to the collection, featuring cutting-edge designs and premium finishes.

item1.title: HPL Parquet Flooring
item1.description: HPL Parquet Flooring combines wood beauty with laminate strength. It offers high durability for homes and commercial spaces. Designed to handle heavy foot traffic. A stylish flooring solution with long-lasting performance.

item2.title: Door Face
item2.description: HPL Door Face panels provide a strong, stylish finish for doors. They resist scratches, moisture, and impact. Perfect for homes, offices, and hotels. Designed for areas that require durability and elegance.

item3.title: Compact blackcore
item3.description: A premium compact laminate with a sleek black edge. Combines high strength with modern aesthetics. Perfect for luxury partitions, countertops, and interiors. Resistant to moisture, impact, and daily wear.

Applications.sectionDescription: Our high-performance solutions are engineered to meet the distinct requirements of diverse sectors, combining durability with exceptional design.

home.title: Home Interiors
home.description: Kitchen countertops, cabinetry, wall panels, and furniture

commercial.title: Commercial Spaces
commercial.description: Hotels, restaurants, cafes, and entertainment venues

hospital.title: Hospital Environments
hospital.description: Wall Cladding – Hospital Doors – Toilet & Shower Cubicles – Partitions & Dividers

CTA.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
CTA.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect HPL solution for your needs. Get in touch today for a consultation.

Footer.about: Almahba is the official authorized agent for Salomil. Leading manufacturer of premium high-pressure laminate solutions.

0.title: Surfaces That Define Excellence
0.description: Premium high-pressure laminate solutions engineered for durability, design, and sustainability.

1.title: Quality That Lasts
1.description: Built to withstand the toughest environments while maintaining timeless beauty and elegance.

About.title: Authorized Excellence Since 2009
About.p1: Welcome to Almahba, the official authorized agent for Salomil. For over a decade, we have dedicated ourselves to providing premium surface solutions that define quality and elegance.
About.p2: Established in 2009 and headquartered in Alexandria, we have grown to become a trusted partner for architects, designers, and manufacturers. Our commitment to excellence ensures that every product we deliver meets the highest standards of durability and design.

HPL.title: High Pressure Laminates (HPL)
HPL.description: Explore our extensive collection of High Pressure Laminates. Durable, versatile, and stylish solutions for every surface.

Compacts.title: Compact Laminates
Compacts.description: Discover our premium Compact Laminates, engineered for durability and style. Perfect for high-traffic areas and humid environments.

Fiber.title: Fiber Glass
Fiber.description: Explore our durable and versatile Fiber Glass solutions, designed for strength and aesthetic appeal in various applications.

Postforming.title: Postforming Laminates
Postforming.description: Break free from straight lines. Our postforming laminates are designed to bend around curved edges, creating seamless, modern surfaces.

CTASection.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
CTASection.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect HPL solution for your needs. Get in touch today for a consultation.

ColorCollections.noteText: Swatches are a representation and may vary in colour from the final product. Please obtain a sample of the product before making a final selection.

Portfolio.title: Projects & Certifications
Portfolio.subtitle: Defining Standards of Excellence in Every Surface

isoSection.title: ISO 9001:2015 Certification
isoSection.subtitle: Commitment to Quality
isoSection.description: Almahba maintains the highest standards of quality management through our ISO 9001:2015 certification. This internationally recognized standard demonstrates our unwavering commitment to consistently providing products that meet customer and regulatory requirements.
isoSection.content: Our quality management system is designed to potentialize continuous improvement, ensuring that every sheet of HPL and Compact Laminate we produce adheres to rigorous quality benchmarks. From raw material selection to final inspection, our processes are optimized for excellence.

euSection.title: European Standards (EN 438)
euSection.subtitle: Global Benchmarks
euSection.description: Our products are manufactured in strict accordance with European Standard EN 438, the definitive benchmark for High-Pressure Decorative Laminates. This ensures superior performance in resistance to wear, impact, heat, and moisture.
euSection.content: By adhering to these stringent specifications, we guarantee that our laminates offer exceptional durability and longevity, making them suitable for the most demanding applications in residential, commercial, and healthcare environments.

TexturePage.title: Texture & Dimensions
TexturePage.subtitle: Explore our premium collection of finishes, meticulously crafted to bring depth and character to every surface.
TexturePage.matrixSubtitle: Comprehensive guide to our texture and size combinations.
TexturePage.note: Note: Availability may vary based on region. Please contact sales for specific requirements.
